wx_card_id = #{wxCardId,jdbcType=CHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},

update t_card set wx_card_id = #{wxCardId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, member_num = #{memberNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, waiting_member_num = #{waitingMemberNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, curr_num = #{currNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=CHAR}, picture_cdn = #{pictureCdn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_url = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, prerogative = #{prerogative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, initial_word = #{initialWord,jdbcType=CHAR}, initial_num = #{initialNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, business_description = #{businessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_card where status = 1 and dr = 1 limit 1
select count(uc.talent_id) from t_card c left join t_user_card uc on c.card_id = uc.card_id where c.card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (uc.status != 3)

select
from t_card where dr = 1 and status = 2
select count(card_id) from t_card c where dr = 1 and c.initial_word = #{initialWord,jdbcType=CHAR}
